file.name: master.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1

info:
  version: "0.1"
  title: EasyUCS API
  description: Description of EasyUCS API

servers: 
  - url: http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/v1

tags:
  - name: "devices"
    description: "Everything about devices"
  - name: "configs"
    description: "Everything about configs"

paths:
  /devices:
    get:
      tags:
        - "devices"
      summary: Get all devices
      description: Returns a list containing all devices in EasyUCS. The list supports paging.
      parameters: 
        - name: pageSize
          in: query
          description: Number of devices returned
          schema:
            type: integer
        - name: pageNumber
          in: query
          description: Page number
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: A list of devices
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "http://127.0.0.1:5000/files/specs/device_list.yaml"
        "400":
          description: Invalid request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "500":
          description: Internal Servor Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
    
    post:
      tags:
          - "devices"
      summary: Create a new device
      description: Creates a new device in EasyUCS.
      requestBody:
        required: True
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "http://127.0.0.1:5000/files/specs/device_post.yaml"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: New device succesfully created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  device-uuid:
                    type: string
                    description: UUID of the created device
                    example: "9fcfe5dd-3b3f-481e-9036-9bb4169fd4ee"
        "400":
          description: Invalid request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "500":
          description: Internal Servor Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
  
  /devices/{device-uuid}:
    get:
      tags:
        - "devices"
      summary: Get a specific device
      description: Returns a specific device in EasyUCS
      parameters: 
        - name: device-uuid
          in: path
          required: True
          description: UUID of the device
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: A device
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                required:
                  - device-uuid
                  - name
                  - type
                properties:
                  device-uuid:
                    type: string
                    description: UUID of the device
                    example: "9fcfe5dd-3b3f-481e-9036-9bb4169fd4ee"
                  name:
                    type: string
                    description: Name of the device
                    example: "UCS-DEMO"
                  type:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - ucs_imc
                      - ucs_system
                    description: Device type
                    example: "ucs_system"
                  ip:
                    type: string
                    description: IP address of the device
                    example: "1.2.3.4"
        "400":
          description: Invalid request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "404":
          description: Ressource not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "500":
          description: Internal Servor Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
    
    delete:
      tags:
        - "devices"
      summary: Delete a device
      description: Deletes a device from EasyUCS
      parameters: 
        - name: device-uuid
          in: path
          required: True
          description: UUID of the device to delete
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Device deleted
        "400":
          description: Invalid request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "404":
          description: Ressource not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "500":
          description: Internal Servor Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
    
    put:
      tags:
        - "devices"
      summary: Modify a device
      description: Modifies a device in EasyUCS
      parameters: 
        - name: device-uuid
          in: path
          required: True
          description: UUID of the device to modify
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        required: True
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "http://127.0.0.1:5000/files/specs/device_put.yaml"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Device modified
        "400":
          description: Invalid request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "404":
          description: Ressource not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "500":
          description: Internal Servor Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
  
  /devices/{device-uuid}/reset:
    post:
      tags:
        - "devices"
      summary: Reset a device
      description: Reset a device to factory default settings
      parameters: 
        - name: device-uuid
          in: path
          required: True
          description: UUID of the device
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        required: True
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "http://127.0.0.1:5000/files/specs/device_id.yaml"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Device succesfully reset
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  serial_number:
                    type: string
                    description: Serial number(s) of the device
                    example: "SSI9999999Z"
                  mac_address:
                    type: string
                    description: MAC address(es) of the device
                    example: "AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF"
        "400":
          description: Invalid request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "404":
          description: Ressource not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "500":
          description: Internal Servor Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
  
  /devices/{device-uuid}/configs:
    get:
      tags:
        - "configs"
      summary: Get configs for a specific device
      description: Returns a list of configs for a specific device in EasyUCS
      parameters: 
        - name: device-uuid
          in: path
          required: True
          description: UUID of the device
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: pageSize
          in: query
          description: Number of devices returned
          schema:
            type: integer
        - name: pageNumber
          in: query
          description: Page Number
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: A list of configs of the requested device
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  required:
                    - config-uuid
                    - timestamp
                    - origin
                  properties:
                    config-uuid:
                      type: string
                      description: UUID of the config
                      example: "77067abe-8b02-428d-82e6-72af0286867f"
                    timestamp:
                      type: string
                      description: Timestamp of the config
                      example: "Tue, 11 Sep 2018 09:09:55"
                    origin:
                      type: string
                      enum:
                        - live
                        - import
                      description: Origin of the config
                      example: "live"
        "400":
          description: Invalid request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "404":
          description: Ressource not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "500":
          description: Internal Servor Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
    
    post:
      tags:
        - "configs"
      summary: Create a new config for a specific device
      description: Creates a new config for a specific device in EasyUCS
      parameters: 
        - name: device-uuid
          in: path
          required: True
          description: UUID of the device
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        required: True
        content:
           multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                file:
                  type: string
                  format: binary
    
      responses:
        "200":
          description: New device succesfully created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  device-uuid:
                    type: string
                    description: UUID of the created device
                    example: "9fcfe5dd-3b3f-481e-9036-9bb4169fd4ee"
          
        "400":
          description: Invalid request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "404":
          description: Ressource not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "500":
          description: Internal Servor Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string

  /devices/{device-uuid}/configs/fetch:
    post:
      tags:
        - "configs"
      summary: Fetch the live config
      description: Fetch the config of a live system.
      parameters:
        - name: device-uuid
          in: path
          required: True
          description: UUID of the device
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        required: True
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "http://127.0.0.1:5000/files/specs/device_id.yaml"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Config fetched
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  uuid:
                    type: string
                    description: UUID of the config fetched
                    example: "9fcfe5dd-3b3f-481e-9036-9bb4169fd4ee"
        "400":
          description: Invalid request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "404":
          description: Ressource not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "500":
          description: Internal Servor Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string

  /devices/{device-uuid}/configs/{config-uuid}:
    get:
      tags:
        - "configs"
      summary: Get a specific config for a device
      description: Returns a specific config for a given device in EasyUCS
      parameters: 
        - name: device-uuid
          in: path
          required: True
          description: UUID of the device
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: config-uuid
          in: path
          required: True
          description: UUID of the config
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: A config
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                required:
                  - config-uuid
                  - timestamp
                  - origin
                properties:
                    config-uuid:
                      type: string
                      description: UUID of the config
                      example: "77067abe-8b02-428d-82e6-72af0286867f"
                    timestamp:
                      type: string
                      description: Timestamp of the config
                      example: "Tue, 11 Sep 2018 09:09:55"
                    origin:
                      type: string
                      enum:
                        - live
                        - import
                      description: Origin of the config
                      example: "live"
        "400":
          description: Invalid request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "404":
          description: Ressource not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "500":
          description: Internal Servor Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
    
    delete:
      tags:
        - "configs" 
      summary: Delete a config from a device
      description: Deletes a config from EasyUCS
      parameters: 
        - name: device-uuid
          in: path
          required: True
          description: UUID of the device to delete
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: config-uuid
          in: path
          required: True
          description: UUID of the config
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Config deleted
        "400":
          description: Invalid request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "404":
          description: Ressource not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "500":
          description: Internal Servor Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string

  /devices/{device-uuid}/inventories:
    get:
      tags:
        - "inventories"
      summary: Get inventories for a specific device
      description: Returns a list of inventories for a specific device in EasyUCS
      parameters: 
        - name: device-uuid
          in: path
          required: True
          description: UUID of the device
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: pageSize
          in: query
          description: Number of devices returned
          schema:
            type: integer
        - name: pageNumber
          in: query
          description: Page Number
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: A list of inventories of the requested device
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  required:
                    - inventory-uuid
                    - timestamp
                    - origin
                  properties:
                    inventory-uuid:
                      type: string
                      description: UUID of the inventory
                      example: "77067abe-8b02-428d-82e6-72af0286867f"
                    timestamp:
                      type: string
                      description: Timestamp of the inventory
                      example: "Tue, 11 Sep 2018 09:09:55"
                    origin:
                      type: string
                      enum:
                        - live
                        - import
                      description: Origin of the inventory
                      example: "live"
        "400":
          description: Invalid request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "404":
          description: Ressource not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "500":
          description: Internal Servor Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
    
    post:
      tags:
        - "inventories"
      summary: Create a new inventory for a specific device
      description: Creates a new inventory for a specific device in EasyUCS
      parameters: 
        - name: device-uuid
          in: path
          required: True
          description: UUID of the device
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        required: True
        content:
           multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                file:
                  type: string
                  format: binary
    
      responses:
        "200":
          description: New device succesfully created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  device-uuid:
                    type: string
                    description: UUID of the created device
                    example: "9fcfe5dd-3b3f-481e-9036-9bb4169fd4ee"
          
        "400":
          description: Invalid request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "404":
          description: Ressource not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "500":
          description: Internal Servor Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
  
  /devices/{device-uuid}/inventories/{inventory-uuid}:
    get:
      tags:
        - "inventories"
      summary: Get a specific inventory for a device
      description: Returns a specific inventory for a given device in EasyUCS
      parameters: 
        - name: device-uuid
          in: path
          required: True
          description: UUID of the device
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: inventory-uuid
          in: path
          required: True
          description: UUID of the inventory
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: A inventory
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                required:
                  - inventory-uuid
                  - timestamp
                  - origin
                properties:
                    inventory-uuid:
                      type: string
                      description: UUID of the inventory
                      example: "77067abe-8b02-428d-82e6-72af0286867f"
                    timestamp:
                      type: string
                      description: Timestamp of the inventory
                      example: "Tue, 11 Sep 2018 09:09:55"
                    origin:
                      type: string
                      enum:
                        - live
                        - import
                      description: Origin of the inventory
                      example: "live"
        "400":
          description: Invalid request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "404":
          description: Ressource not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "500":
          description: Internal Servor Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
    
    delete:
      tags:
        - "inventories" 
      summary: Delete a inventory from a device
      description: Deletes a inventory from EasyUCS
      parameters: 
        - name: device-uuid
          in: path
          required: True
          description: UUID of the device to delete
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: inventory-uuid
          in: path
          required: True
          description: UUID of the inventory
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: inventory deleted
        "400":
          description: Invalid request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "404":
          description: Ressource not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
        "500":
          description: Internal Servor Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /devices/{device-uuid}/reset: post: operation "": requestBody: content: "application/json": parse schema: parse schema: reference "http://127.0.0.1:5000/files/specs/device_id.yaml": resolve reference "http://127.0.0.1:5000/files/specs/device_id.yaml": invalid schema reference "http://127.0.0.1:5000/files/specs/device_id.yaml"
